name: Game Over (itch) (Creepmobile)
description:
You are Death. Fly around and deliver your sweet kiss to those clueless mortals. But don't be seen; or if you do, make sure they don't live long enough to tell anyone. The true power of Death is in its mystery: you never know when it's coming. Lose your mystery, lose your power.

Controls: WASD + Space  ;  Numpad 8456 + 0

Coming soon:

  • Additional levels with increasing difficulty and problem complexity.
  • Varying NPCs with varying behavior.
  • Maybe sounds?
  • Improved physics

Made for the great Nokia 3310 Game Jam of 2020.

Produced with GameMaker Studio 2. Thanks for the temp license, Yoyo Games!
